title: Birdie Rattle
summaries: The Birdie Rattle is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Lil' Harpy pet to follow the player around. The Lil' Harpy, when summoned, will fly above and behind the player, and will behave similar to the Zephyr Fish, continually flying around and looking side to side. It will never land and can fly through blocks. The Birdie Rattle can be purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 1 PC.
